aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by requests based on the allowed set of values for each of the tags

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by actions based on tag-value associated with the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by requests based on the presence of mandatory tags in the request

iam:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by actions based on tag-value associated with the resource
